content:
You have an Azure virtual machine
named VM1 that runs Windowvs
Server 2016.
You need to create an alert in Azure
when more than two error events are
logged to the System event log on
VM1 within an hour.
Solution: You create an Azure Log
Analytics workspace and contigure
the data settings. You add the
Microsoft Monitoring Agent VM
extensiIon to VM1. You create an
alert in Azure Monitor and specity
the Log Analytics Workspace as the
Source.
Does this meet the goal?
select the correct answer
True
False
